overview: Today, indifference to each other, devaluation of the other person's personality have become, unfortunately, the norm of life. The habit of ignoring the desires and aspirations of another person, not even allowing the thought of their existence, leads to cruel, and sometimes criminal actions. Understanding that each person is a unique universe, a unique world, could save humanity from many tragic events. Humanity can be saved, but does it want to?
title: The Story of One Painting
